creator: masao@ulis.ac.jp
text:
Is "ctime a typo of "strftime" in the following text:

http://httpd.apache.org/docs/howto/ssi.html.en#whenwasthisdocumentmodified

  For more details on the timefmt format, go to your favorite search site and
look for ctime. The syntax is the same.
You are indeed correct.  Thanks for the catch.
creator: slive@apache.org
